page.title: 18COURTGATES AND MANOR FARMS
page.content: Courtgates{farm}is owned by Mr E. Hendy. It is a beef farm which stretches over 200 acres, including a 1 acre wood. On this farm they grow: {CORN } = 70 acres {SWEDES }= 10 acres {HAY } = 60 acres The rest of the land is used for grazing. They have 150{beef cattle, with approx. 45 calves yearly, and 110 {sheep,}with approx. 200{lambs}yearly. They also have 2 horses. Manor farm is owned by Mr M. Veale. It is both dairy and beef, stretching over 50 hectares. The crops grown are: {POTATOES} = 5 acres CORN = 14 acres SWEDES = 1.5 acres They have 70 sheep and 52 cows , both dairy and beef, with approx. 40 calves and 100 lambs yearly. Mr Veales herd is a pedigree herd.
